data.title: The Settlers History Collection
data.meta_description: Official-Site. 7 games, 25 years of History. Discover the entire Settlers series before the new entry arrives in March 17th, 2022.
data.text:
THE SETTLERS (1993) History Edition

Haven’t you always wanted to be king? Indulge your fantasy in the world of The Settlers. You alone determine how your kingdom will be formed, how large it will be, whether to limit your ambitions to agriculture, breeding of stock, and fishing, or whether you want to start an industrial revolution. Turn back the clock 25 years and relive the fascination of this classic in gaming history!

IMPROVEMENT HIGHLIGHTS: Windows 10 compatible, different game speed options, classic RTS controls (optional)

LEARN MORE

THE SETTLERS II – Veni, Vidi, Vici History Edition

The Settlers II History Edition is modernized version of the highly detailed and humorous economic simulation.

As leader of the Romans, you take over the responsibility for the fate of your people. Withstand the elements and be aware of your opponents: Vikings, Nubians and Japanese. Includes The Settlers II, The Settlers II Mission and the map editor.

IMPROVEMENT HIGHLIGHTS: Windows 10 compatible, auto save, different resolutions including full screen, mouse, keyboard, and controller support for split-screen mode

LEARN MORE

THE SETTLERS III History Edition

The Settlers III is a lavishly designed, strategy-filled fantasy civilization simulation in which you have your industrious little subjects construct buildings, produce goods, and conquer new lands in exciting real-time battles. Includes The Settlers III, The Settlers III Mission CD, and the expansion pack Quest of the Amazons.

IMPROVEMENT HIGHLIGHTS: Windows 10 compatible, auto save, 4K and dual monitor support, multiplayer via Ubisoft Connect

LEARN MORE

THE SETTLERS IV History Edition

Experience in this modernized History Edition, the beauty and wonder of the world of The Settlers with four playable races: the Romans, the Vikings, the Mayans, and the Trojans. Face the threat of the Dark Tribe and his leader Morbus. Includes The Settlers IV, The Settlers IV Mission CD, the add-on The Settlers IV – The Trojans and the Elixir of Power and The New World addon.

IMPROVEMENT HIGHLIGHTS: Windows 10 compatible, auto save, 4K and dual monitor support, multiplayer via Ubisoft Connect

LEARN MORE

THE SETTLERS – Rise of an Empire History Edition

In this modernized version of The Settlers – Rise of an Empire, you can build vibrant cities in a medieval world. Each character leads their individual lives and can be observed by you at any time. The main goal of the game is to increase the wealth of your empire and to go down in history as a legendary king. Includes the main game and the expansion The Eastern Realm.

IMPROVEMENT HIGHLIGHTS: Windows 10 compatible, multiplayer via Ubisoft Connect

LEARN MORE

THE SETTLERS 7 History Edition

Let yourself be enchanted by the new world of Settlers in this modernized History Edition – in the midst of green forests and lush meadows, it will bustle again. You alone hold the fate of your kingdom in your hands. Which strategy will you choose? Whether as a well-read scientist, crafty merchant, or brave general – it is up to you to build a prosperous kingdom with power and prestige.

IMPROVEMENT HIGHLIGHTS: Windows 10 compatible

LEARN MORE
